title: Naruto: Shippuden

awardEventDetails.title: 2018 Nominee BTVA Anime Dub Television/OVA Voice Acting Award
awardEventDetails.for: Best Male Vocal Performance in an Anime Television Series/OVA in a Supporting Role
awardEventDetails.description: Neil Kaplan (As the voice of "Madara Uchiha".)

awardEventDetails.title: 2015 Nominee BTVA Anime Dub Television/OVA Voice Acting Award
awardEventDetails.for: Best Male Vocal Performance in an Anime Television Series/OVA in a Supporting Role
awardEventDetails.description: Kirk Thornton (As the voice of "Kisame Hoshigaki".)

awardEventDetails.title: 2014 Nominee BTVA Anime Dub Television/OVA Voice Acting Award
awardEventDetails.for: Best Female Vocal Performance in an Anime Television Series/OVA in a Supporting Role
awardEventDetails.description: Stephanie Sheh (As the voice of "Hinata Hyuga".)

awardEventDetails.title: 2014 Winner BTVA People's Choice Voice Acting Award
awardEventDetails.for: Best Female Vocal Performance in an Anime Television Series/OVA in a Supporting Role
awardEventDetails.description: Stephanie Sheh (As the voice of "Hinata Hyuga".)

awardEventDetails.title: 2013 Winner BTVA People's Choice Voice Acting Award
awardEventDetails.for: Best Male Vocal Performance in an Anime Television Series/OVA in a Supporting Role
awardEventDetails.description: Crispin Freeman (As the voice of "Itachi Uchiha".)

awardsHtml:
2 wins & 10 nominations

Behind the Voice Actors Awards

2018 Nominee BTVA Anime Dub Television/OVA Voice Acting Award
Best Male Vocal Performance in an Anime Television Series/OVA in a Supporting Role
Neil Kaplan (As the voice of "Madara Uchiha".)
2015 Nominee BTVA Anime Dub Television/OVA Voice Acting Award
Best Male Vocal Performance in an Anime Television Series/OVA in a Supporting Role
Kirk Thornton (As the voice of "Kisame Hoshigaki".)
2014 Nominee BTVA Anime Dub Television/OVA Voice Acting Award
Best Female Vocal Performance in an Anime Television Series/OVA in a Supporting Role
Stephanie Sheh (As the voice of "Hinata Hyuga".)
2014 Winner BTVA People's Choice Voice Acting Award
Best Female Vocal Performance in an Anime Television Series/OVA in a Supporting Role
Stephanie Sheh (As the voice of "Hinata Hyuga".)
2013 Winner BTVA People's Choice Voice Acting Award
Best Male Vocal Performance in an Anime Television Series/OVA in a Supporting Role
Crispin Freeman (As the voice of "Itachi Uchiha".)

Crunchyroll Anime Awards

2018 Nominee Anime Award
Best Continuing Series
2017 Nominee Anime Award
Best Fight Scene (Most popular "Other")
(For Naruto vs. Sasuke)
